name: Mia
description: She overwhelms others with her knowledge, rude words and talking speed. An archaeology nut who is highly intelligent and absorbs new information at a stunning pace thanks to her spirit lens.

passiveSkill.name: Goddess of Wisdom
passiveSkill.description: ${d.lens5.skill ? d.lens5.skill : "When Mia dies {placeholder} of her ATK and {placeholder} of her HP are transferred to the Ally Leader; her DMG Rate in battle increases by {placeholder}."}

uniqueSkill.name: Bastet's Order
uniqueSkill.description: ${d.lens4.skill ? d.lens4.skill : "Lets loose Pharaoh's Jade Cat to rip the enemy's armor to shreds. Mia attacks a single enemy and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage, reducing the target's DEF by {placeholder} for 2 rounds."}

specialSkill.name: Aid of Bastet
specialSkill.description: ${d.lens6.skill ? d.lens6.skill : "The Jade Cat sinks his teeth deep into the enemy. Attacks a single enemy and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage, increasing DEF Penetration by {placeholder} when attacking.Chance to use skill: {placeholder}"}

normalSkill.name: Adjudication
normalSkill.description: Mia goes into a dance with her whip. Attacks a single enemy and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage.

templateData.lens4.skill: Lets loose Pharaoh's Jade Cat to rip the enemy's armor to shreds. Mia attacks a single enemy and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage, reducing the target's DEF by {placeholder} for 2 rounds.
templateData.lens5.skill: When Mia dies {placeholder} of her ATK and {placeholder} of her HP are transferred to the Ally Leader; her DMG Rate in battle increases by {placeholder}.
templateData.lens6.skill: The Jade Cat sinks his teeth deep into the enemy. Attacks a single enemy and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage, increasing DEF Penetration by {placeholder} when attacking.Chance to use skill: {placeholder}
